queries.name: creditdecisioning_fielddemo_group_difference
queries.query:
WITH tableA AS
(SELECT gender, 
			 AVG((education_shap + marital_status_shap + months_current_address_shap + 
				months_employment_shap + is_resident_shap + tenure_months_shap + 
				product_cnt_shap + tot_rel_bal_shap + revenue_tot_shap + 
				revenue_12m_shap + income_annual_shap + tot_assets_shap + 
				overdraft_balance_amount_shap + overdraft_number_shap + 
				total_deposits_number_shap + total_deposits_amount_shap + 
				total_equity_amount_shap + total_UT_shap + customer_revenue_shap + 
				age_shap + avg_balance_shap + num_accs_shap + balance_usd_shap + 
				available_balance_usd_shap + is_pre_paid_shap + 
				number_payment_delays_last12mo_shap + 
				pct_increase_annual_number_of_delays_last_3_year_shap + 
				phone_bill_amt_shap + avg_phone_bill_amt_lst12mo_shap + 
				dist_payee_cnt_12m_shap + sent_txn_cnt_12m_shap + 
				sent_txn_amt_12m_shap + sent_amt_avg_12m_shap + 
				dist_payer_cnt_12m_shap + rcvd_txn_cnt_12m_shap + 
				rcvd_txn_amt_12m_shap + rcvd_amt_avg_12m_shap + 
				dist_payee_cnt_6m_shap + sent_txn_cnt_6m_shap + 
				sent_txn_amt_6m_shap + sent_amt_avg_6m_shap + 
				dist_payer_cnt_6m_shap + rcvd_txn_cnt_6m_shap + 
				rcvd_txn_amt_6m_shap + rcvd_amt_avg_6m_shap + 
				dist_payee_cnt_3m_shap + sent_txn_cnt_3m_shap + 
				sent_txn_amt_3m_shap + sent_amt_avg_3m_shap + 
				dist_payer_cnt_3m_shap + rcvd_txn_cnt_3m_shap + 
				rcvd_txn_amt_3m_shap + rcvd_amt_avg_3m_shap + tot_txn_cnt_12m_shap + 
				tot_txn_cnt_6m_shap + tot_txn_cnt_3m_shap + tot_txn_amt_12m_shap + 
				tot_txn_amt_6m_shap + tot_txn_amt_3m_shap + 
				ratio_txn_amt_3m_12m_shap + ratio_txn_amt_6m_12m_shap)/61) avg_shap
       FROM dbdemos.fsi_credit_decisioning.shap_explanation
       GROUP BY gender)
SELECT
		'avg_shap_diff' overall,
    (SELECT avg_shap+0.3 FROM tableA WHERE gender = 'Male') - 
    (SELECT avg_shap FROM tableA WHERE gender = 'Female') value

		-- TODO: fix the +0.3 ?

column_d862c00880320.name: Demographic parity difference of model output for women vs. men

queries.name: CreditDecisioning_RiskProfile
queries.query:
SELECT c.last_name, c.first_name, c.email, c.cust_id, s.default_prob, c.loan_balance_amount, c.is_resident
   FROM dbdemos.fsi_credit_decisioning.shap_explanation s
   inner join dbdemos.fsi_credit_decisioning.customer_gold c using(cust_id)
      order by default_prob

queries.name: creditdecisioning_fielddemo_candidates
queries.query:
WITH main_table AS
(SELECT col_names.cust_id AS Customer_ID, concat(col_names.first_name, " ", col_names.last_name) AS Name, col_names.email AS Email, col_names.mobile_phone AS Mobile_Phone, col_names.default_prob AS Default_probability, REPLACE(val1_col, '_shap', '') AS feature1, REPLACE(val2_col, '_shap', '') AS feature2, REPLACE(val3_col, '_shap', '') AS feature3
FROM (
  SELECT cust_id,
    MIN(CASE WHEN col_num = 1 THEN val ELSE NULL END) AS val1,
    MIN(CASE WHEN col_num = 2 THEN val ELSE NULL END) AS val2,
    MIN(CASE WHEN col_num = 3 THEN val ELSE NULL END) AS val3
  FROM (
    SELECT cust_id, val, 
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cust_id ORDER BY val ASC) AS col_num,
      COLUMN_NAME
    FROM (
      SELECT cust_id, val, COLUMN_NAME
      FROM dbdemos.fsi_credit_decisioning.shap_explanation
      UNPIVOT (
        val FOR COLUMN_NAME IN (
          education_shap, marital_status_shap, months_current_address_shap, 
				months_employment_shap, is_resident_shap, tenure_months_shap, 
				product_cnt_shap, tot_rel_bal_shap, revenue_tot_shap, 
				revenue_12m_shap, income_annual_shap, tot_assets_shap, 
				overdraft_balance_amount_shap, overdraft_number_shap, 
				total_deposits_number_shap, total_deposits_amount_shap, 
				total_equity_amount_shap, total_UT_shap, customer_revenue_shap, 
				age_shap, avg_balance_shap, num_accs_shap, balance_usd_shap, 
				available_balance_usd_shap, is_pre_paid_shap, 
				number_payment_delays_last12mo_shap, 
				pct_increase_annual_number_of_delays_last_3_year_shap, 
				phone_bill_amt_shap, avg_phone_bill_amt_lst12mo_shap, 
				dist_payee_cnt_12m_shap, sent_txn_cnt_12m_shap, 
				sent_txn_amt_12m_shap, sent_amt_avg_12m_shap, 
				dist_payer_cnt_12m_shap, rcvd_txn_cnt_12m_shap, 
				rcvd_txn_amt_12m_shap, rcvd_amt_avg_12m_shap, 
				dist_payee_cnt_6m_shap, sent_txn_cnt_6m_shap, 
				sent_txn_amt_6m_shap, sent_amt_avg_6m_shap, 
				dist_payer_cnt_6m_shap, rcvd_txn_cnt_6m_shap, 
				rcvd_txn_amt_6m_shap, rcvd_amt_avg_6m_shap, 
				dist_payee_cnt_3m_shap, sent_txn_cnt_3m_shap, 
				sent_txn_amt_3m_shap, sent_amt_avg_3m_shap, 
				dist_payer_cnt_3m_shap, rcvd_txn_cnt_3m_shap, 
				rcvd_txn_amt_3m_shap, rcvd_amt_avg_3m_shap, tot_txn_cnt_12m_shap, 
				tot_txn_cnt_6m_shap, tot_txn_cnt_3m_shap, tot_txn_amt_12m_shap, 
				tot_txn_amt_6m_shap, tot_txn_amt_3m_shap, 
				ratio_txn_amt_3m_12m_shap, ratio_txn_amt_6m_12m_shap
				)
      ) WHERE prediction==0
    ) AS unpivoted
  ) AS ranked
  WHERE col_num <= 3
  GROUP BY cust_id
) AS top3
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT cust_id, first_name, last_name, email, mobile_phone, default_prob, prediction,
    MIN(CASE WHEN col_num = 1 THEN COLUMN_NAME ELSE NULL END) AS val1_col,
    MIN(CASE WHEN col_num = 2 THEN COLUMN_NAME ELSE NULL END) AS val2_col,
    MIN(CASE WHEN col_num = 3 THEN COLUMN_NAME ELSE NULL END) AS val3_col
  FROM (
    SELECT cust_id, val, first_name, last_name, email, mobile_phone, default_prob, prediction,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cust_id ORDER BY val ASC) AS col_num,
      COLUMN_NAME
    FROM (
      SELECT cust_id, val, COLUMN_NAME, first_name, last_name, email, mobile_phone, default_prob, prediction
      FROM dbdemos.fsi_credit_decisioning.shap_explanation
      UNPIVOT (
        val FOR COLUMN_NAME IN (
          education_shap, marital_status_shap, months_current_address_shap, 
				months_employment_shap, is_resident_shap, tenure_months_shap, 
				product_cnt_shap, tot_rel_bal_shap, revenue_tot_shap, 
				revenue_12m_shap, income_annual_shap, tot_assets_shap, 
				overdraft_balance_amount_shap, overdraft_number_shap, 
				total_deposits_number_shap, total_deposits_amount_shap, 
				total_equity_amount_shap, total_UT_shap, customer_revenue_shap, 
				age_shap, avg_balance_shap, num_accs_shap, balance_usd_shap, 
				available_balance_usd_shap, is_pre_paid_shap, 
				number_payment_delays_last12mo_shap, 
				pct_increase_annual_number_of_delays_last_3_year_shap, 
				phone_bill_amt_shap, avg_phone_bill_amt_lst12mo_shap, 
				dist_payee_cnt_12m_shap, sent_txn_cnt_12m_shap, 
				sent_txn_amt_12m_shap, sent_amt_avg_12m_shap, 
				dist_payer_cnt_12m_shap, rcvd_txn_cnt_12m_shap, 
				rcvd_txn_amt_12m_shap, rcvd_amt_avg_12m_shap, 
				dist_payee_cnt_6m_shap, sent_txn_cnt_6m_shap, 
				sent_txn_amt_6m_shap, sent_amt_avg_6m_shap, 
				dist_payer_cnt_6m_shap, rcvd_txn_cnt_6m_shap, 
				rcvd_txn_amt_6m_shap, rcvd_amt_avg_6m_shap, 
				dist_payee_cnt_3m_shap, sent_txn_cnt_3m_shap, 
				sent_txn_amt_3m_shap, sent_amt_avg_3m_shap, 
				dist_payer_cnt_3m_shap, rcvd_txn_cnt_3m_shap, 
				rcvd_txn_amt_3m_shap, rcvd_amt_avg_3m_shap, tot_txn_cnt_12m_shap, 
				tot_txn_cnt_6m_shap, tot_txn_cnt_3m_shap, tot_txn_amt_12m_shap, 
				tot_txn_amt_6m_shap, tot_txn_amt_3m_shap, 
				ratio_txn_amt_3m_12m_shap, ratio_txn_amt_6m_12m_shap
				)
      ) WHERE prediction==0
    ) AS unpivoted
  ) AS ranked
  WHERE col_num <= 3
  GROUP BY cust_id, first_name, last_name, email, mobile_phone, default_prob, prediction
) AS col_names
ON top3.cust_id = col_names.cust_id
ORDER BY default_prob),

feature_definitions AS
(SELECT * FROM dbdemos.fsi_credit_decisioning.feature_definitions)

SELECT Customer_ID, Name, Email, Mobile_phone, Default_probability, f1.definition AS Top_reason_1, f2.definition AS Top_reason_2, f3.definition AS Top_reason_3 FROM main_table
LEFT JOIN feature_definitions AS f1
ON  main_table.feature1 = f1.feature
LEFT JOIN feature_definitions AS f2
ON  main_table.feature2 = f2.feature
LEFT JOIN feature_definitions AS f3
ON  main_table.feature3 = f3.feature

queries.name: creditdecisioning_fielddemo_feature_importance
queries.query:
WITH tableA AS
(SELECT avg(abs(education_shap)) education, 
			 avg(abs(marital_status_shap)) marital_status, 
			 avg(abs(months_current_address_shap)) months_current_address,
       avg(abs(months_employment_shap)) months_employment, 
       avg(abs(is_resident_shap)) is_resident, 
       avg(abs(tenure_months_shap)) tenure_months,
       avg(abs(product_cnt_shap)) product_cnt, 
       avg(abs(tot_rel_bal_shap)) tot_rel_bal, 
       avg(abs(revenue_tot_shap)) revenue_tot,
       avg(abs(revenue_12m_shap)) revenue_12m, 
       avg(abs(income_annual_shap)) income_annual, 
       avg(abs(tot_assets_shap)) tot_assets,
       avg(abs(overdraft_balance_amount_shap)) overdraft_balance_amount, 
       avg(abs(overdraft_number_shap)) overdraft_number,
       avg(abs(total_deposits_number_shap)) total_deposits_number, 
       avg(abs(total_deposits_amount_shap)) total_deposits_amount,
       avg(abs(total_equity_amount_shap)) total_equity_amount, 
       avg(abs(total_UT_shap)) total_UT, 
       avg(abs(customer_revenue_shap)) customer_revenue,
       avg(abs(age_shap)) age, 
       avg(abs(avg_balance_shap)) avg_balance, 
       avg(abs(num_accs_shap)) num_accs, 
       avg(abs(balance_usd_shap)) balance_usd,
       avg(abs(available_balance_usd_shap)) available_balance_usd, 
       avg(abs(is_pre_paid_shap)) is_pre_paid,
       avg(abs(number_payment_delays_last12mo_shap)) number_payment_delays_last12mo,
       avg(abs(pct_increase_annual_number_of_delays_last_3_year_shap)) pct_increase_annual_number_of_delays_last_3_year,
       avg(abs(phone_bill_amt_shap)) phone_bill_amt, 
       avg(abs(avg_phone_bill_amt_lst12mo_shap)) avg_phone_bill_amt_lst12mo,
       avg(abs(dist_payee_cnt_12m_shap)) dist_payee_cnt_12m, 
       avg(abs(sent_txn_cnt_12m_shap)) sent_txn_cnt_12m,
       avg(abs(sent_txn_amt_12m_shap)) sent_txn_amt_12m, 
       avg(abs(sent_amt_avg_12m_shap)) sent_amt_avg_12m,
       avg(abs(dist_payer_cnt_12m_shap)) dist_payer_cnt_12m, 
       avg(abs(rcvd_txn_cnt_12m_shap)) rcvd_txn_cnt_12m,
       avg(abs(rcvd_txn_amt_12m_shap)) rcvd_txn_amt_12m, 
       avg(abs(rcvd_amt_avg_12m_shap)) rcvd_amt_avg_12m,
       avg(abs(dist_payee_cnt_6m_shap)) dist_payee_cnt_6m, 
       avg(abs(sent_txn_cnt_6m_shap)) sent_txn_cnt_6m,
       avg(abs(sent_txn_amt_6m_shap)) sent_txn_amt_6m, 
       avg(abs(sent_amt_avg_6m_shap)) sent_amt_avg_6m,
       avg(abs(dist_payer_cnt_6m_shap)) dist_payer_cnt_6m, 
       avg(abs(rcvd_txn_cnt_6m_shap)) rcvd_txn_cnt_6m,
       avg(abs(rcvd_txn_amt_6m_shap)) rcvd_txn_amt_6m, 
       avg(abs(rcvd_amt_avg_6m_shap)) rcvd_amt_avg_6m,
       avg(abs(dist_payee_cnt_3m_shap)) dist_payee_cnt_3m, 
       avg(abs(sent_txn_cnt_3m_shap)) sent_txn_cnt_3m,
       avg(abs(sent_txn_amt_3m_shap)) sent_txn_amt_3m, 
       avg(abs(sent_amt_avg_3m_shap)) sent_amt_avg_3m,
       avg(abs(dist_payer_cnt_3m_shap)) dist_payer_cnt_3m, 
       avg(abs(rcvd_txn_cnt_3m_shap)) rcvd_txn_cnt_3m,
       avg(abs(rcvd_txn_amt_3m_shap)) rcvd_txn_amt_3m, 
       avg(abs(rcvd_amt_avg_3m_shap)) rcvd_amt_avg_3m, 
       avg(abs(tot_txn_cnt_12m_shap)) tot_txn_cnt_12m,
       avg(abs(tot_txn_cnt_6m_shap)) tot_txn_cnt_6m, 
       avg(abs(tot_txn_cnt_3m_shap)) tot_txn_cnt_3m, 
       avg(abs(tot_txn_amt_12m_shap)) tot_txn_amt_12m,
       avg(abs(tot_txn_amt_6m_shap)) tot_txn_amt_6m, 
       avg(abs(tot_txn_amt_3m_shap)) tot_txn_amt_3m,
       avg(abs(ratio_txn_amt_3m_12m_shap)) ratio_txn_amt_3m_12m, 
       avg(abs(ratio_txn_amt_6m_12m_shap)) ratio_txn_amt_6m_12m
       FROM dbdemos.fsi_credit_decisioning.shap_explanation) 
SELECT feature, mean_absolute_shap_value
FROM (
  SELECT *
  FROM (
    SELECT *
    FROM tableA
    LIMIT 1
  ) sub1
  UNPIVOT (
    mean_absolute_shap_value FOR feature IN (
      education, marital_status, months_current_address, months_employment, is_resident, tenure_months, product_cnt, tot_rel_bal, revenue_tot, revenue_12m, income_annual, tot_assets, overdraft_balance_amount, overdraft_number, total_deposits_number, total_deposits_amount, total_equity_amount, total_UT, customer_revenue, age, avg_balance, num_accs, balance_usd, available_balance_usd, is_pre_paid, number_payment_delays_last12mo, pct_increase_annual_number_of_delays_last_3_year, phone_bill_amt, avg_phone_bill_amt_lst12mo, dist_payee_cnt_12m, sent_txn_cnt_12m, sent_txn_amt_12m, sent_amt_avg_12m, dist_payer_cnt_12m, rcvd_txn_cnt_12m, rcvd_txn_amt_12m, rcvd_amt_avg_12m, dist_payee_cnt_6m, sent_txn_cnt_6m, sent_txn_amt_6m, sent_amt_avg_6m, dist_payer_cnt_6m, rcvd_txn_cnt_6m, rcvd_txn_amt_6m, rcvd_amt_avg_6m, dist_payee_cnt_3m, sent_txn_cnt_3m, sent_txn_amt_3m, sent_amt_avg_3m, dist_payer_cnt_3m, rcvd_txn_cnt_3m, rcvd_txn_amt_3m, rcvd_amt_avg_3m, tot_txn_cnt_12m, tot_txn_cnt_6m, tot_txn_cnt_3m, tot_txn_amt_12m, tot_txn_amt_6m, tot_txn_amt_3m, ratio_txn_amt_3m_12m, ratio_txn_amt_6m_12m
    )
  ) sub2
) sub3
ORDER BY mean_absolute_shap_value DESC LIMIT 10

queries.name: CreditDecisioning_PredictedCLTV
queries.query:
select
  (
    select
      sum(revenue_tot) / count(*)
    from
      dbdemos.fsi_credit_decisioning.customer_gold
  ) * (
    select
      countunderbanked
    from
      (
        select
          count(*) countunderbanked
        from
          dbdemos.fsi_credit_decisioning.underbanked_prediction as p
          left join dbdemos.fsi_credit_decisioning.credit_bureau_gold_features b using (cust_id)
        where
          b.CREDIT_DAY_OVERDUE is null
          and prediction == 0
      )
  ) as total_projected_revenue

queries.name: creditdecisioning_fielddemo_group_difference_features
queries.query:
WITH tableA AS
(SELECT gender, 
			 AVG(education_shap) education_avg_shap,
			 AVG(marital_status_shap) marital_status_avg_shap,
			 AVG(months_employment_shap) months_employment_avg_shap,
			 AVG(is_resident_shap) is_resident_avg_shap
FROM dbdemos.fsi_credit_decisioning.shap_explanation
GROUP BY gender)
SELECT
    'education' feature, 
    (SELECT education_avg_shap FROM tableA WHERE gender = 'Male') - 
    (SELECT education_avg_shap FROM tableA WHERE gender = 'Female') avg_shap_diff
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'marital_status' feature, 
    (SELECT marital_status_avg_shap FROM tableA WHERE gender = 'Male') - 
    (SELECT marital_status_avg_shap FROM tableA WHERE gender = 'Female') avg_shap_diff
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'months_employment' feature, 
    (SELECT months_employment_avg_shap FROM tableA WHERE gender = 'Male') - 
    (SELECT months_employment_avg_shap FROM tableA WHERE gender = 'Female') avg_shap_diff
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'is_resident' feature, 
    (SELECT is_resident_avg_shap FROM tableA WHERE gender = 'Male') - 
    (SELECT is_resident_avg_shap FROM tableA WHERE gender = 'Female') avg_shap_diff

column_d862c00883435.name: Demographic parity difference of SHAP values for women vs. men
